name: Bad cabbage on the run!
description:
You are a rocketship driver and are fed up of seeing all the lovely cabbage being destroyed by rotting cabbage.  So... its time to take action! get into your rocket-wagon and DEE-STROY! 

The aim of the game is to reach 1500 points.. with 3 lives. Which means you have destroyed the bulk of the problem. A problem like that will never truly die.. but maybe you have the potential... 

Go Get em, Cadet. .. MAKE US PROUD!
